title: Clamping in div1?
body:
I thought riot removed clamping in div 1?

plat 1 +12 -22 G fkn G

replies.body:
Adding in Master tier dropped the average MMR of everyone so bad LP loss/gain is usually caused by that or just plain you getting rolled and losing majority of games. 

+12/-22 sounds amazing to me since coppin a brutal +3/-30 all the way from Plat to Diam. 8)

Diamond 1 was clamped to prevent people getting into challenger promos easily.

There is no clamping anymore. Not even in challenger.

+12, -22 sounds like bad MMR to me. Might have something to do with your record recently dropping below 50% winrate.
